message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'd be happy to take it off your hands for $85.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $105 is still a little too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95. If that works for you, we have a deal.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to accept $95. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $100. This is my final offer.
